00021 /*
00022  * It's not really scheme but something slightly similar, features left out 
00023  * include:
00024  * - first class continuations
00025  * - and maybe something other 
00026  */

00455 #define DFSCH_TRUE_P(o) ((o) != NULL)
00456 
00464 #define DFSCH_OBJECT_ARG(al, name)\
00465   if (DFSCH_UNLIKELY(!DFSCH_PAIR_P((al))))          \
00466     dfsch_error("exception:required-argument-missing",  \
00467                 dfsch_make_string_cstr(#name));\
00468   (name) = DFSCH_FAST_CAR((al)); \
00469   (al) = DFSCH_FAST_CDR((al))
00470 
00477 #define DFSCH_DISCARD_ARG(al, name)\
00478   if (DFSCH_UNLIKELY(!DFSCH_PAIR_P((al))))              \
00479     dfsch_error("exception:required-argument-missing",  \
00480                 dfsch_make_string_cstr(#name));         \
00481   (al) = DFSCH_FAST_CDR((al))
00482 
00492 #define DFSCH_OBJECT_ARG_OPT(al, name,default)\
00493   if (!DFSCH_PAIR_P((al))) \
00494    { (name) = (default);}else\
00495   {(name) = DFSCH_FAST_CAR((al)); \
00496   (al) = DFSCH_FAST_CDR((al));}
00497 
00507 #define DFSCH_GENERIC_ARG(al, name, type, conv)\
00508   if (DFSCH_UNLIKELY(!DFSCH_PAIR_P((al))))          \
00509     dfsch_error("exception:required-argument-missing",  \
00510                 dfsch_make_string_cstr(#name));         \
00511   { dfsch_object_t* dfsch___tmp = DFSCH_FAST_CAR((al)); \
00512     (name) = (type)(conv)(dfsch___tmp);                 \
00513     (al) = DFSCH_FAST_CDR((al));                        \
00514   }
00515 
00527 #define DFSCH_GENERIC_ARG_OPT(al, name, default, type, conv)\
00528   if (!DFSCH_PAIR_P((al))) \
00529     {(name)=(default);} else\
00530   { dfsch_object_t* dfsch___tmp = DFSCH_FAST_CAR((al)); \
00531     (name) = (type)(conv)(dfsch___tmp); \
00532     (al) = DFSCH_FAST_CDR((al));\
00533   }
00534 
00540 #define DFSCH_ARG_END(al) \
00541   if ((al) != NULL)                                     \
00542     dfsch_error("exception:too-many-arguments",NULL)
00543 
00547 #define DFSCH_ARG_REST(al, rest) \
00548   (rest) = (al)
00549 
00550 
00551 #define DFSCH_OBJECT_CACHE(constructor, name)                           \
00552   dfsch_object_t* name(){                                               \
00553     static dfsch_object_t* dfsch___cache = NULL;                        \
00554     if (!dfsch___cache)                                                 \
00555       dfsch___cache = constructor;                                      \
00556     return dfsch___cache;                                               \
00557   }// This depends on full-word stores being atomic (which they generally are)
00558 
00559 
00560 #define DFSCH_SYMBOL_CACHE(symbol, name)                \
00561   DFSCH_OBJECT_CACHE(dfsch_make_symbol(symbol), name)
00562 
00563 #define DFSCH_LOCAL_SYMBOL_CACHE(symbol, name)  \
00564   static DFSCH_SYMBOL_CACHE(symbol, name)
00565 
00566 
00567 #define DFSCH_FLAG_PARSER_BEGIN(args)                           \
00568   while (DFSCH_PAIR_P((args))){                                 \
00569     dfsch_object_t* dfsch___flag = DFSCH_FAST_CAR((args));
00570 
00571 #define DFSCH_FLAG_PARSER_BEGIN_SYM_ONLY(args)                  \
00572   while (DFSCH_PAIR_P((args))){                                 \
00573     dfsch_object_t* dfsch___flag = DFSCH_FAST_CAR((args));      \
00574     if (!dfsch_symbol_p(dfsch___flag)) break;
00575   
00576 #define DFSCH_FLAG_PARSER_BEGIN_ONE(args, name) \
00577   if (!DFSCH_PAIR_P((args))){                                           \
00578     dfsch_error("exception:required-argument-missing", #name);          \
00579   }                                                                     \
00580   {                                                                     \
00581     dfsch_object_t* dfsch___flag;                                       \
00582     dfsch___flag = DFSCH_FAST_CAR((args));                              \
00583     if (!dfsch_symbol_p(dfsch___flag)) {                                \
00584       dfsch_error("exception:not-a-symbol", dfsch___flag);              \
00585     }
00586 
00587 #define DFSCH_FLAG_PARSER_BEGIN_ONE_OPT(args, name)                     \
00588   if (DFSCH_PAIR_P((args))){                                            \
00589     dfsch_object_t* dfsch___flag;                                       \
00590     dfsch___flag = DFSCH_FAST_CAR((args));                              \
00591     if (!dfsch_symbol_p(dfsch___flag)) {                                \
00592       dfsch_error("exception:not-a-symbol", dfsch___flag);              \
00593     }
00594 
00595       
00596 #define DFSCH_FLAG_VALUE(name, value, variable)                         \
00597   if (dfsch_compare_symbol(dfsch___flag, (name))) (variable) = (value)    
00598     
00599 #define DFSCH_FLAG_SET(name, value, variable)                           \
00600   if (dfsch_compare_symbol(dfsch___flag, (name))) (variable) |= (value)    
00601   
00602 #define DFSCH_FLAG_UNSET(name, value, variable)                         \
00603   if (dfsch_compare_symbol(dfsch___flag ,(name))) (variable) &= ~(value)    
00604   
00605 #define DFSCH_FLAG_FUNC(name)                           \
00606   if (dfsch_compare_symbol(dfsch___flag ,(name))) 
00607   
00608 #define DFSCH_FLAG_PARSER_END(args) \
00609   (args) = DFSCH_FAST_CDR((args));  \
00610 }
00611 
00612 #define DFSCH_KEYWORD_PARSER_BEGIN(args)                                \
00613   while (DFSCH_PAIR_P((args))){                                         \
00614     dfsch_object_t* dfsch___keyword;                                    \
00615     dfsch_object_t* dfsch___value;                                      \
00616     dfsch___keyword = DFSCH_FAST_CAR((args));                           \
00617     (args) = DFSCH_FAST_CDR((args));                                    \
00618     if (!DFSCH_PAIR_P((args))){                                         \
00619       dfsch_error("exception:keyword-without-arguemnt", dfsch___keyword); \
00620     }                                                                   \
00621     dfsch___value = DFSCH_FAST_CAR((args));                             \
00622     (args) = DFSCH_FAST_CDR((args));
00623   
00624 #define DFSCH_KEYWORD(name, variable)                 \
00625   if (dfsch_compare_symbol(dfsch___keyword, (name))){ \
00626     (variable) = (dfsch___value);                     \
00627     continue;                                         \
00628   }
00629 #define DFSCH_KEYWORD_GENERIC(name, variable, conv)        \
00630   if (dfsch_compare_symbol(dfsch___keyword, (name))){ \
00631     (variable) = conv(dfsch___value);                     \
00632     continue;                                         \
00633   }
00634   
00635 
00636 #define DFSCH_KEYWORD_PARSER_END(args)                                  \
00637   dfsch_error("exception:unknown-keyword", dfsch___keyword);   \
00638   }
00639 
00640 #define DFSCH_SYMBOL_ARG(al, name)                      \
00641   DFSCH_GENERIC_ARG(al, name, char*, dfsch_symbol)
00642 #define DFSCH_SYMBOL_ARG_OPT(al, default, name)                 \
00643   DFSCH_GENERIC_ARG_OPT(al, name, default, char*, dfsch_symbol)
00644 #define DFSCH_TYPE_ARG(al, name)                                        \
00645   DFSCH_GENERIC_ARG(al, name, dfsch_type_t*, dfsch_object_as_type)
